com.carrotsearch.hppc

Class ShortLongScatterMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.carrotsearch.hppc.ShortLongHashMap
      • com.carrotsearch.hppc.ShortLongScatterMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Preallocable, ShortLongAssociativeContainer, ShortLongMap, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<ShortLongCursor>

    @Generated(date="2017-10-22T12:19:55+0200",
           value="KTypeVTypeScatterMap.java")
public class ShortLongScatterMap
extends ShortLongHashMap
    Same as ShortLongHashMap but does not implement per-instance key mixing strategy and uses a simpler (faster) bit distribution function.

    Note: read about important differences between hash and scatter sets.

    • Method Detail

      • hashKey

        protected int hashKey(short key)
        Description copied from class: ShortLongHashMap
        Returns a hash code for the given key.

        The default implementation mixes the hash of the key with ShortLongHashMap.keyMixer to differentiate hash order of keys between hash containers. Helps alleviate problems resulting from linear conflict resolution in open addressing.

        The output from this function should evenly distribute keys across the entire integer range.

        Overrides:
        hashKey in class ShortLongHashMap
